title: Smart Data Models - UnderexcLim2Simplified
description: Adapted from CIM data models. This model can be derived from UnderexcLimIEEE2. The limit characteristic (look -up table) is a single straight-line, the same as UnderexcLimIEEE2 (see Figure 10.4 (p 32), IEEE 421.5-2005 Section 10.2).

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be UnderexcLim2Simplified

kui.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain Under excitation limiter (Kui).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

p0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Segment P initial point (P0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

p1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Segment P end point (P1).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

q0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Segment Q initial point (Q0).  Typical Value = -0.31. Default: 0.0

q1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Segment Q end point (Q1).  Typical Value = -0.1. Default: 0.0

vuimax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum error signal (V).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

vuimin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum error signal (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0
